theRhythmGirl:TimeSignature54.NAME: 5/4 Time Signature
theRhythmGirl:TimeSignature54.FLAVOR: This relic doesn't exist, but its effects are used when the player has no other 'Time Signature' relic.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you have more than #b5 #yBeat, lose #b5 #yBeats and gain #b1 #yMeasure.

theRhythmGirl:TimeSignature44.NAME: 4/4 Time Signature
theRhythmGirl:TimeSignature44.FLAVOR: Rumor has it that those who lose their 'Time Signature' will have to deal with 5/4 time.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you have more than #b4 #yBeat, lose #b4 #yBeats and gain #b1 #yMeasure.

theRhythmGirl:TimeSignature34.NAME: 3/4 Time Signature
theRhythmGirl:TimeSignature34.FLAVOR: Rumor has it that those who lose their 'Time Signature' will have to deal with 5/4 time.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces [#a45a52]4/4 [#a45a52]Time [#a45a52]Signature[]. Whenever you have more than #b3 #yBeat, lose #b3 #yBeats and gain #b1 #yMeasure.

theRhythmGirl:TimeSignature24.NAME: 2/4 Time Signature
theRhythmGirl:TimeSignature24.FLAVOR: Rumor has it that those who lose their 'Time Signature' will have to deal with 5/4 time.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces [#a45a52]4/4 [#a45a52]Time [#a45a52]Signature[]. Whenever you have more than #b2 #yBeat, lose #b2 #yBeats and gain #b1 #yMeasure.

theRhythmGirl:Cowbell.NAME: Cowbell
theRhythmGirl:Cowbell.FLAVOR: When you feel like you've lost the rhythm, you can always fall back on this cue to guide you.
